item.title: A reminder of the usefulness of Git
item.description: Despite the fact that none of the projects that I’ve worked on have used Git or Mercurial as the team’s main repository I keep forgetting how useful those tools can be even if they’re just being used locally. I ran into a problem when trying to work out why a Rhino Mocks expectation wasn’t working as I expected last week having refactored a bit of code to include a constructor.
